snippet: The decision to trade the Cy Young Award winner R. A. Dickey shows a lack of gratitude and tells Mets fans that they will have to keep waiting.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column says New York Mets decision to trade pitcher R A Dickey to Toronto Blue Jays shows a lack of gratitude and essentially tells Mets fans that they do not expect to contend for the next three years.
lead_paragraph: The decision to trade the Cy Young Award winner R. A. Dickey shows a lack of gratitude and tells Mets fans that they will have to keep waiting.

headline.print_headline: Mets Show Gratitude With a Pitch in the Dirt
headline.seo: R. A. Dickey Deserved Better from Mets
headline.main: Mets Show Gratitude With a Pitch in the Dirt
